list.name: Episodes
list.rawQuery: SELECT StartTimestamp as time, CONCAT('Episode: ', PrimaryDetector, ' (', CAST(DurationHours as VARCHAR), 'h)') as text, 'Episode' as tags FROM ACM_CulpritHistory WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND StartTimestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND StartTimestamp <= $__timeTo()

list.name: Drift Events
list.rawQuery: SELECT Timestamp as time, CONCAT('Drift: ', CAST(Value as VARCHAR)) as text, 'Drift' as tags FROM ACM_DriftEvents WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND Timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND Timestamp <= $__timeTo()

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1 HealthIndex FROM ACM_HealthTimeline 
           WHERE EquipID = $equipment 
           ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

SELECT TOP 1 
           CASE 
             WHEN HealthIndex >= 85 THEN 'HEALTHY'
             WHEN HealthIndex >= 70 THEN 'CAUTION'
             ELSE 'ALERT'
           END as Status
           FROM ACM_HealthTimeline 
           WHERE EquipID = $equipment 
           ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

SELECT TOP 1 
           CONCAT(SensorName, ' (z=', CAST(ROUND(LatestAbsZ, 2) as VARCHAR), ')') as WorstSensor
           FROM ACM_SensorHotspots 
           WHERE EquipID = $equipment
           AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment)
           ORDER BY LatestAbsZ DESC

SELECT TOP 1 
           StartTimestamp as LastAlertTime,
           DurationHours as AlertDurationHours
           FROM ACM_AlertAge 
           WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND AlertZone = 'ALERT'
           AND $__timeFilter(StartTimestamp)
           ORDER BY StartTimestamp DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as ActiveEpisodes
           FROM ACM_CulpritHistory 
           WHERE EquipID = $equipment 
           AND $__timeFilter(StartTimestamp)

SELECT TOP 1 
           CONCAT('Regime ', CAST(RegimeLabel as VARCHAR)) as CurrentRegime
           FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline 
           WHERE EquipID = $equipment 
           ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  SensorName AS metric,
  NormValue AS value
FROM ACM_SensorNormalized_TS
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
ORDER BY Timestamp, SensorName

SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  SensorName AS metric,
  ZScore AS value
FROM ACM_SensorNormalized_TS
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
ORDER BY Timestamp, SensorName

SELECT
    Timestamp AS time,
    HealthIndex,
    FusedZ
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
ORDER BY Timestamp;

SELECT
    Timestamp AS time,
    HealthIndex AS "Health Index",
    FusedZ      AS "Fused Score"
FROM ACM_DefectTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
ORDER BY Timestamp;

SELECT
    Timestamp AS time,
    CONCAT('Regime ', CAST(RegimeLabel AS VARCHAR(10))) AS value
FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
ORDER BY Timestamp;

SELECT TOP 10
  ra.SensorName,
  ra.FailureContribution * 100.0 AS FailureContribution,
  ra.ZScoreAtFailure,
  ra.AlertCount,
  ra.FailureTime,
  ISNULL(ff.FailureProb * 100.0, 0.0) AS FailureProbabilityAtTime
FROM ACM_RUL_Attribution ra
OUTER APPLY (
  SELECT TOP 1 FailureProb
  FROM ACM_FailureForecast_TS ff
  WHERE ff.EquipID = ra.EquipID
    AND ff.Timestamp >= ra.FailureTime
  ORDER BY ff.Timestamp ASC
) ff
WHERE ra.EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY FailureContribution DESC

panels.title: Failure Attribution by Sensor (at Predicted Failure Time)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  TOP 20 SensorName AS [Sensor Name],
  ROUND(LatestAbsZ, 2) AS [Current Z-Score],
  ROUND(MaxAbsZ, 2) AS [Peak Z-Score],
  MaxTimestamp AS [Peak Time],
  ROUND(LatestValue, 2) AS [Current Value],
  ROUND(TrainMean, 2) AS [Normal Mean],
  AboveAlertCount AS [Alert Count],
  CASE
    WHEN LatestAbsZ >= 3 THEN 'ALERT'
    WHEN LatestAbsZ >= 2 THEN 'CAUTION'
    ELSE 'NORMAL'
  END AS [Level]
FROM
  ACM_SensorHotspots
WHERE
  EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(MaxTimestamp)
  AND RunID = (
    SELECT
      MAX(RunID)
    FROM
      ACM_SensorHotspots
    WHERE
      EquipID = $equipment
  )
ORDER BY
  LatestAbsZ DESC

SELECT
    PeriodStart AS period,
    HealthZone  AS zone,
    ZonePct     AS percentage
FROM ACM_HealthZoneByPeriod
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(PeriodStart)
ORDER BY PeriodStart, HealthZone

SELECT Timestamp as time, DriftValue as value
           FROM ACM_DriftSeries 
           WHERE EquipID = $equipment 
           AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
           ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT TOP 15
       DetectorType AS detector,
       ContributionPct AS contribution,
       ZScore AS zscore
FROM ACM_ContributionCurrent
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_ContributionCurrent WHERE EquipID = $equipment)
ORDER BY ContributionPct DESC;

panels.description: Over time, which detector contributes how much to the overall decision?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    Timestamp AS time,
    DetectorType AS detector,
    ContributionPct AS contribution
FROM ACM_ContributionTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
ORDER BY Timestamp, DetectorType;

panels.title: Detector Contributions Over Time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    DetectorA as detector1, 
    DetectorB as detector2, 
    AVG(PearsonR) as correlation
FROM ACM_DetectorCorrelation
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_DetectorCorrelation WHERE EquipID = $equipment)
GROUP BY DetectorA, DetectorB
ORDER BY DetectorA, DetectorB

SELECT 
           TotalEpisodes as [Total Episodes],
           ROUND(AvgDurationHours, 1) as [Avg Duration (h)],
           ROUND(MaxDurationHours, 1) as [Max Duration (h)],
           ROUND(RatePerDay, 2) as [Episodes/Day],
           ROUND(MeanInterarrivalHours, 1) as [Interarrival (h)]
           FROM ACM_EpisodeMetrics 
           WHERE EquipID = $equipment
           AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_EpisodeMetrics WHERE EquipID = $equipment)

SELECT
  CONCAT('Regime ', CAST(RegimeLabel as VARCHAR)) as regime,
  Percentage as value
FROM
  ACM_RegimeOccupancy
WHERE
  EquipID = $equipment
  AND RunID = (
    SELECT
      MAX(RunID)
    FROM
      ACM_RegimeOccupancy
    WHERE
      EquipID = $equipment
  )
ORDER BY
  Percentage DESC

SELECT
  PeriodStart as time,
  DetectorType as detector,
  AnomalyRatePct as value
FROM
  ACM_SensorAnomalyByPeriod
WHERE
  EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(PeriodStart)
ORDER BY
  PeriodStart,
  DetectorType

SELECT 
           DetectorType as [Detector],
           ROUND(MeanZ, 2) as [Mean Z],
           ROUND(P95Z, 2) as [P95 Z],
           ROUND(P99Z, 2) as [P99 Z],
           ROUND(ClipZ, 1) as [Clip Threshold],
           ROUND(SaturationPct, 1) as [Saturation %]
           FROM ACM_CalibrationSummary 
           WHERE EquipID = $equipment
           AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_CalibrationSummary WHERE EquipID = $equipment)

SELECT 
  ComponentName as [Component],
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN MetricType = 'VarianceRatio' THEN Value END), 4) as [Variance %],
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN MetricType = 'CumulativeVariance' THEN Value END), 4) as [Cumulative %]
FROM ACM_PCA_Metrics 
WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND ComponentName <> 'Total'
GROUP BY ComponentName
ORDER BY ComponentName

SELECT 
           MetricName as metric,
           ROUND(MetricValue, 2) as value
           FROM ACM_RegimeStability 
           WHERE EquipID = $equipment
           AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_RegimeStability WHERE EquipID = $equipment)

SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  ForecastHealth AS [Forecast Health],
  CiLower AS [CI Lower],
  CiUpper AS [CI Upper]
FROM ACM_HealthForecast_TS
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT TOP 1 RUL_Hours
FROM ACM_RUL_Summary
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_RUL_Summary WHERE EquipID = $equipment)
ORDER BY LastUpdate DESC

SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  FailureProb * 100.0 AS [Failure Probability]
FROM ACM_FailureForecast_TS
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
ORDER BY Timestamp

panels.description: Forecast trends for engineered statistical features (rate-of-change, skewness, kurtosis) derived from physical sensors. Shows which sensor features are changing most rapidly.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  SensorName AS metric,
  ForecastValue AS value
FROM ACM_SensorForecast_TS
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
ORDER BY Timestamp, SensorName

panels.title: Engineered Feature Forecast (Top Varying Features)

panels.description: Forecast trends for active detector Z-scores (AR1, CUSUM, PCA, GMM, IForest, Mahalanobis). Shows projected anomaly detection algorithm outputs indicating degradation trends.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  DetectorName AS metric,
  ForecastValue AS value
FROM ACM_DetectorForecast_TS
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
ORDER BY Timestamp, DetectorName

panels.title: Detector Forecast (Top Active Detectors)

panels.description: FusedZ compared to adaptive threshold (green) vs hardcoded 3.0 (red). Shows impact of data-driven thresholds.

targets.rawSql:
-- FusedZ over time with adaptive vs hardcoded thresholds
SELECT 
  ht.Timestamp AS time,
  'FusedZ' AS metric,
  ht.FusedZ AS value
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ht
WHERE ht.EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(ht.Timestamp)

UNION ALL

-- Latest adaptive threshold (flat line)
SELECT 
  ht.Timestamp AS time,
  'Adaptive Threshold' AS metric,
  (
    SELECT TOP 1 ThresholdValue 
    FROM ACM_ThresholdMetadata 
    WHERE EquipID = $equipment 
      AND ThresholdType = 'fused_alert_z' 
      AND RegimeID IS NULL 
      AND IsActive = 1
    ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC
  ) AS value
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ht
WHERE ht.EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(ht.Timestamp)

UNION ALL

-- Hardcoded 3.0 for comparison
SELECT 
  ht.Timestamp AS time,
  'Hardcoded 3.0' AS metric,
  3.0 AS value
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ht
WHERE ht.EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(ht.Timestamp)

ORDER BY time, metric

panels.title: Adaptive Threshold Comparison

panels.description: Current adaptive thresholds in use. Shows global and per-regime values with calculation metadata.

targets.rawSql:
-- Latest active thresholds per regime
SELECT 
  tm.ThresholdType,
  CASE 
    WHEN tm.RegimeID IS NULL THEN 'Global'
    ELSE CAST(tm.RegimeID AS VARCHAR)
  END AS RegimeID,
  tm.ThresholdValue,
  tm.CalculationMethod,
  tm.SampleCount,
  tm.CreatedAt,
  DATEDIFF(HOUR, tm.TrainStartTime, tm.TrainEndTime) AS TrainingHours
FROM ACM_ThresholdMetadata tm
WHERE tm.EquipID = $equipment
  AND tm.IsActive = 1
ORDER BY 
  CASE WHEN tm.ThresholdType = 'fused_alert_z' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END,
  CASE WHEN tm.RegimeID IS NULL THEN 999 ELSE tm.RegimeID END

panels.title: Active Threshold Metadata

panels.description: How adaptive thresholds have changed over time as more training data becomes available. Tracks threshold drift and regime-specific adjustments.

targets.rawSql:
-- Per-regime threshold evolution over time
SELECT 
  tm.CreatedAt AS time,
  CONCAT(
    CASE 
      WHEN tm.RegimeID IS NULL THEN 'Global'
      ELSE CONCAT('Regime ', CAST(tm.RegimeID AS VARCHAR))
    END,
    ' - ',
    tm.ThresholdType
  ) AS metric,
  tm.ThresholdValue AS value
FROM ACM_ThresholdMetadata tm
WHERE tm.EquipID = $equipment
  AND $__timeFilter(tm.CreatedAt)
ORDER BY tm.CreatedAt, metric

panels.title: Threshold Evolution History

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT EquipID FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ORDER BY EquipID
list.label: Equipment
list.name: equipment
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT EquipID FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ORDER BY EquipID
